nodes.text: Loche Crestingsky was a Human male who was on Tansarii Point Station for a period of time during the Galactic Civil War. He was also a skilled marksman.

Loche Crestingsky was a non-player character in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-roleplaying game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
